title: Unusual and varying errors specific to go1.5(.x) running on Mac OSX
body:
The four errors, whose stacktrace can be found below, only occur on Mac OSX El Capitan (will report the findings after I have tested it on Yosemite, as well) with go1.5(.x). I have tested the code with all the minor releases starting from 1.3.3 to 1.5.1. The crashes only occur in 1.5 and 1.5.1 (used [gvm](https://github.com/moovweb/gvm)). I tested the code on [Ubuntu 15.04](http://virtualboxes.org/images/ubuntu/#ubuntu1504) and no crash occured whatsoever in the said versions.

The crashes are highly-reproducible. All the unusual stacktraces (reason of crash) I have found as yet are below and I cannot say which one of these will be the reason in a given run. In other words, they are (pseudo)random.

The code is that of a webservice and the crash occurs in the first couple (usually the first) of requests. It does not crash as long as no request is received.

I am providing all the stacktraces here, in one place, because the cause of all of them seems unique.

(relevant: #13372)
